title: வெவ்வேறு ஷூ அணிந்து ஓடினாரா கோமதி மாரிமுத்து?
author: tamil.factcrescendo.com
vclaim: Instead these type facts, why don’t you try scams and other things like science and history ..it will very useful for society. Please I request you to don’t put efforts lower class people … If you want to know the truth please expose raffle scams, Pollachi issues, Perambalur issues.
